channel.title: Minding the Gap on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Minding the Gap on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Preparation for the Next Life’ Filmmaker Bing Liu on His Narrative Feature Debut and Why a ‘Minding the Gap’ Sequel Is Unlikely
item.description: The director says it would be challenging to recreate the conditions behind his Oscar-nominated skating doc, which nobody could have anticipated would become such a success.
